tyrelion.music
Class TyrelionMusic

java.lang.Object
  org.newdawn.slick.Music
      tyrelion.music.TyrelionMusic

public class TyrelionMusic
extends Music

This is an extension of the original Slick Music class. It does nothing more than adding a String variable for the category the music belongs to.

Author:
jahudi
